title: Elegant Gold and Diamond Bangles - Kanganam
features: Contemporary bangle design featuring parallel gold bands connected by diamond clusters. The diamonds are set in a prong setting to maximize brilliance. The design offers a modern minimalist aesthetic while retaining a touch of traditional South Indian elegance through its refined gold work and lustrous Hyderabadi polish.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. Suitable for both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
description: This modern take on the classic kanganam offers a blend of tradition and contemporary style, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the 22K gold ensures lasting value. The piece showcases the exceptional craftsmanship of Hyderabad's finest artisans, with its flawless finish and elegant design. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these bangles are ideal for all-day wear.
